name: Sea Lodge

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My Boyfriend and I stayed at the Sea Lodge in April of this year.
reviews.title: Nice clean room for the price.

likes.disliked: — doors could be more secure, power kills AC sometimes for about an hour.

description: If what you're looking for is a conveniently located hotel in Koh Tao (Suratthani), look no further than Sea Lodge Hotel. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. For those of you who want to venture out, Mae Haad, Sairee Beach, Sai Nuan Beach are just some of the attractions available to visitors.Offering hotel guests superior services and a broad range of amenities, Sea Lodge Hotel is committed to ensuring that your stay is as comfortable as possible. Top features of the hotel include restaurant, safety deposit boxes, coffee shop, bar/pub, Wi-Fi in public areas.The ambiance of Sea Lodge Hotel is reflected in every guestroom. internet access – wireless (complimentary), desk, balcony/terrace, shower, complimentary bottled water are just some of the facilities at your disposal. The hotel offers wonderful recreational facilities such as water sports (non-motorized) to make your stay truly unforgettable. With an ideal location and facilities to match, Sea Lodge Hotel hits the spot in many ways.
